info.sourceTextContent:
Julita se echó a reír, ruborizada.
En torno de la plaza, donde llegaron en seguida, se agitaba la multitud, pugnando por entrar; los coches que allí se juntaban producían disturbios y motines, que los guardias no eran suficientes a reprimir.
info.suspiciousTextContent:
Julia blushed as she laughed all around the plaza.
They had arrived at once, the crowd stirred, they were struggling with whether they should have came or not. Cars started to gather, while riots started and disturbances were made. There were to little guards to suppress this issue
